PrecisEnactment of the CANADA SMALL BUSINESS FINANCING (ESTABLISHMENT AND OPERATION OF CAPITAL LEASING PILOT PROJECT) REGULATIONS which provide for the establishment of a five-year pilot project to test whether to guarantee capital leases.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0527 Publication Date: 2001-12-19
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of the CANADA SMALL BUSINESS FINANCING (ESTABLISHMENT AND
OPERATION OF CAPITAL LEASING PILOT PROJECT) REGULATIONS which provide for
the establishment of a five-year pilot project to test whether to guarantee
capital leases.
